languages.text: "Пожалуй, от вас есть польза. Дозволяю тебе взять немного оружия попроще и проваливать. Служи кораблю как следует".

traits.locale_text: "Пожалуй, от вас правда есть польза. Дозволяю тебе взять парочку оружия попроще — ступай, держи прочих бандитов в страхе и помни мою доброту".

languages.text: "I suppose you may be of some use. I shall permit you to take a few of the more basic weapons and leave. Serve the ship well."
languages.original_text: "Пожалуй, от вас есть польза. Дозволяю тебе взять немного оружия попроще и проваливать. Служи кораблю как следует".

traits.locale_text: "I suppose you may be of some use. I shall permit you to take a few of the more basic weapons and leave. Serve the ship well."
"I suppose you may be of some use. I shall permit you to take a few of the more basic weapons and leave. Serve the ship well."
"I suppose you may be of some use. I shall permit you to take a few of the more basic weapons and leave. Serve the ship well."
"I suppose you may be of some use. I shall permit you to take a few of the more basic weapons and leave. Serve the ship well."
"I suppose you may be of some use. I shall permit you to take a few of the more basic weapons and leave. Serve the ship well."

languages.text: «Supongo que podrían resultar de utilidad. Les permitiré que se vayan con algunas de las armas más rudimentarias. Sirvan bien a la nave».
languages.original_text: "I suppose you may be of some use. I shall permit you to take a few of the more basic weapons and leave. Serve the ship well."

traits.locale_text: «Supongo que podrían resultar de utilidad. Les permitiré que se vayan con algunas de las armas más rudimentarias. Sirvan bien a la nave».

languages.text: 「もしかして役に立つかもしれない。基本的な武器をいくつか持っていくことを許可しよう。必ず船のために尽くすんだ」
languages.original_text: "I suppose you may be of some use. I shall permit you to take a few of the more basic weapons and leave. Serve the ship well."

traits.locale_text: 「もしかして役に立つかもしれない。基本的な武器をいくつか持っていくことを許可しよう。必ず船のために尽くすんだ」

languages.text: “我猜你们确实能派上些用场。我允许你们带走几件最基本的武器，好好为这艘船服务吧。”
languages.original_text: "I suppose you may be of some use. I shall permit you to take a few of the more basic weapons and leave. Serve the ship well."

traits.locale_text: “我猜你们确实能派上些用场。我允许你们带走几件最基本的武器，好好为这艘船服务吧。”

languages.text: "Ich denke, Ihr könntet nützlich sein. Ich gestatte euch, mit einigen der einfacheren Waffen zu gehen. Dient dem Schiff gut."
languages.original_text: "I suppose you may be of some use. I shall permit you to take a few of the more basic weapons and leave. Serve the ship well."

traits.locale_text: "Ich denke, Ihr könntet nützlich sein. Ich gestatte euch, mit einigen der einfacheren Waffen zu gehen. Dient dem Schiff gut."

languages.text: « Ma foi, vous pouvez peut-être vous rendre utiles. C'est bon, prenez donc quelques armes rudimentaires et partez. À charge pour vous de bien servir le vaisseau. »
languages.original_text: "I suppose you may be of some use. I shall permit you to take a few of the more basic weapons and leave. Serve the ship well."

traits.locale_text: « Ma foi, vous pouvez peut-être vous rendre utiles. C'est bon, prenez donc quelques armes rudimentaires et partez. À charge pour vous de bien servir le vaisseau. »

languages.text: "Sanırım işime yarayabilirsiniz. Daha temel olan silahlardan birkaç tane alıp uzaklaşmanıza izin veriyorum. Gemiye iyi hizmet edin."
languages.original_text: "I suppose you may be of some use. I shall permit you to take a few of the more basic weapons and leave. Serve the ship well."
